item.title: By: Nick McGivney
item.dc:creator: Nick McGivney
item.description: I am a copywriter, Stuart. How dare you question my spelling?
item.content:encoded: I am a copywriter, Stuart. How dare you question my spelling?

item.title: By: Stewart Curry
item.dc:creator: Stewart Curry
item.description: You'll need to learn to spell my name right first though Nick!
item.content:encoded: You’ll need to learn to spell my name right first though Nick!

item.title: By: Nick McGivney
item.dc:creator: Nick McGivney
item.description: So proud of you. I want to marry you all. Yes, even Stuart. It's unorthodox, I'll grant you, but we can make this work.
item.content:encoded: So proud of you. I want to marry you all. Yes, even Stuart. It’s unorthodox, I’ll grant you, but we can make this work.

item.title: By: Claudio Perrone
item.dc:creator: Claudio Perrone
item.description: Congratulations Martha! Looking forward to it. /Claudio

item.title: By: Katherine
item.dc:creator: Katherine
item.description: What a great idea! I look forward to your first issue.
item.content:encoded: What a great idea! I look forward to your first issue.
